name: Cosmonet
description:
You are an avian biologist on the space station studying how well birds can fly in zero gravity. And your job is really boring so you spend most of your time chatting with your friends on Earth and taking online personality quizzes.

Cosmonet is a short branching narrative game where you control the dialogue indirectly by taking personality quizzes. It was created for Global Game Jam 2018 by Sean Bouchard and Martzi Campos. Music by Kyle Laporte.
